data.name: Forging Glory
data.detailed_description:
ON HOLD

Unfortunately, due to a myriad of external factors, we have had to put Forging Glory on hold for the time being in favor of smaller titles.

It's been an amazing, and painstaking, five year journey. We've learned a lot and experienced wonderful memories we'll cherish forever. We hope you will continue to join us in our game development adventure by joining us in playing our smaller titles.

Again, apologies, and thank you all.

KICKASSERY

Decapitate, dismember, shatter, and mutilate avatars built of light! You're a God of the arena, annihilating all who challenge you.

MASTERY

Combat is all about skill in Forging Glory. You must aim your attacks, and your blocks. There is no magic "block all" button!

CUSTOMIZATION

Create the perfect avatars to fit each battle and play-style using limitless weapons and items.

FANDOM

Earn glory by pleasing the crowd, leading you to greater rewards and fame!

Key Features:

  • Single-player and multiplayer dynamic campaigns, with 6 game modes.
  • Fully customizable classless character system
  • Physics-based combat with 7 unique weapon types
  • 70+ modifiers and 300+ special abilities to mix and match
  • Build a demon, a humanoid castle, or a blend! Many skins to mix and match, all earned without microtransactions!
  • Even a fun automatic GIF generator, connected to our Discord, for easy bragging!

data.short_description: Forging Glory is a physics-based looter brawler with limitless player customization; letting you experience the glory of brutal gladiatorial combat in a futuristic, virtual world.
data.reviews:
“Mordhau's kinetic action meets Path of Exile's customization.”
Beta Player

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 Gigahertz Dual Core or Better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any NVIDIA or ATI graphics card after 2013. Specifically, NVIDIA GTX 600 series or above, or AMD R9 270 and above.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 Gigahertz Dual Core or Better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any NVIDIA or ATI graphics card after 2013. Specifically, NVIDIA GTX 600 series or above, or AMD R9 270 and above.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
